summary: A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.
cast: Humphrey Bogart|Mary Astor|Gladys George|Peter Lorre|Barton MacLane|Lee Patrick|Sydney Greenstreet|Ward Bond|Jerome Cowan|Elisha Cook Jr.|James Burke|Murray Alper|John Hamilton|Charles Drake|Chester Gan|Creighton Hale|Robert Homans|William Hopper|Walter Huston|Hank Mann|Jack Mower|Emory Parnell
title: El halcón maltés
